alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 9:10PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, east winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 5 AM MST Wednesday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
